name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BigTube - Better Youtube Theater Mode & More

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full-sized theater mode, miniplayer on scroll, Popout player for all video sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
